title: Ketu Transit in the 12th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting the twelfth house intensifies detachment, solitude, and spiritual release for Leo ascendants. Interest in withdrawal, meditation, or foreign isolation increases, while material concerns fade. Sleep patterns may shift and expenses feel vague or unnoticed. This phase favors healing, closure, and letting go of unconscious fears. When grounded routines support introspection, Ketu grants deep inner peace and freedom from old karmic loops.

sections.heading: Career
points: Work in isolation or foreign settings

closing: This transit completes a cycle of release. By surrendering what no longer serves, Ketu opens the door to profound inner freedom.
